modules.name: muLooper
modules.description: Recording sampler for the very short (65536 samples max) loops

modules.name: LFSR8 Poly
modules.description: Fully deterministic sequencer based on 8-bit LFSR capable to produce pseudo-random results

modules.name: LFSR16 Poly
modules.description: 16-bit LFSR sequencer with ability to split for two independent registers

modules.name: Droplets
modules.description: Sequencer loosely based on the liquid flow in the leaky faucet

modules.name: ChaosMaps
modules.description: Sequencer based on the logistic and tent maps

modules.name: MicroLooper
modules.description: Recording sampler for the very short (16384 samples max) loops. Replaced with muLooper

modules.name: LFSR8
modules.description: Fully deterministic sequencer based on 8-bit LFSR capable to produce pseudo-random results. Replaced witg LFSR8Poly

modules.name: LFSR16
modules.description: 16-bit LFSR sequencer with ability to split for two independent registers. Replaced witg LFSR16Poly
